author: cericeci
body:
#### PR description:

The PR propagates inverse beta timing information to be available for pat::Muon.

We would like to backport it later to 10_6_X (adapted to run only in 2016 UL conditions). 

@peruzzim @Fedespring 

#### PR validation:
No compilation errors or of battery of tests from
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all

Unit testing with [pat::Muon only producer](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/test/patTuple_onlyMuons_cfg.py) reproduces values stored at RECO level
title: Propagate inverse beta variable to pat muons (muon POG)
